/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a corridor of urban life. Cars are parked along the sides of the road, hinting at the busy nature of the area. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue of the sky and the gray of the buildings.
